channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Blocked drain outside 47 merlin road, 12th February
item.description:
This drain does not get rid of the rain water when it's rains, this keeps happening i think the drain will need cleaning.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Merlin Road, Blackfen, Greater London

item.title: Huge lake of water forms at crossing dropped kerb when it rains outside Vodafone shop Holloway road N7 nags head, 12th February
item.description:
Large lake of water pools on the pedestrian crossing dropped kerb in the road and pedestrians cannot access the crossing safely. Outside the Vodafone shop on Holloway road N7. Please rectify asap

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Holloway Road, Holloway, Greater London

item.title: Right next to the parking bay outside 30 Grafton way building, 12th February
item.description:
This was apparently fixed weekend 7th February 2026 however they properly fixed another manhole cover next to this one and just put some black tar type material on this manhole cover which has made no difference to the constant noise as residents we have to listen to all day and night in fact its worse now and the when they closed the road to allow the other manhole cover they repaired to set vehicle drivers just moved the barrier and continued to use the road which means nothing was allowed to set properly and is probably why the black tar stuff they placed on the noisy manhole cover hasn't stoped the noise and the other manhole cover they did properly fix will soon make a noise too as the amount of vehicles which drove on the road even though it was closed was horrendous this noise has been going on for over 6 months now and please please please can you get them to fix it and get this horrific constant noise stopped please

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Grafton Way, Fitzrovia, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
